alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 30 at 1:46PM MST until December 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 70 MPH expected. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County and South Laramie Range. * WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. There will be a high risk for vehicle blow overs, particularly along north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range
